apiDoc.name: ImageContent
apiDoc.description: A content renderer for image events supporting NIP-94 imeta tags. Displays multiple images with metadata (dimensions, file size, mime type) and optional alt text captions. Features formatted file sizes, mime type labels, and separate image/container CSS classes. Ideal for rendering image galleries or individual images from NIP-94 events.
